attributes.action: install Mr. Tony as a Secretary of State of some description
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I agree with you. There's a fair few like that on here. Cheers though, it's nice to hear that I'm not on my own in thinking this. 

AND I get to say that I have received a message from _Anonymous_. My grandparasites (sorry, CHILDREN) will be so proud of me. ;o)

Tx

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
